name: Ladder Man
description:
Quick Note: If you can't hear anything, just restart the page.

Before getting into the description, I would like to list the CONTROLS below:

PC:

W / Up Arrow - Climb Up

S / Down Arrow - Climb Down

Escape - Go To Main Menu

Mobile: Swipe Up  to Climb Up, and Swipe Down to Climb Down.

How to play? Well, it's quite simple. You are a construction worker trying to climb your way to the top of the ladder. The catch is that this construction worker reaaally loves birds. And birds love him too. That's why you need to avoid them at all costs. Good luck!

Everything you see and hear in this game is made by me. You can show me some support by taking a minute and following me on my socials, listed in the Community menu. Thanks.

Game made for Tailfeather Studios' Game Jam, and maybe I will update the game in the future, who knows?
